popover.primary: A mastery path focused on immediate damage
A mastery path focused on longer-duration effects
A mastery path focused on wide-area effects

data.name: Enhance War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted buff. Increases damage done by that siege engine by 2% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Hex War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted debuff. Increases the cooldown times of that siege engine by 50% for 10 seconds

data.name: Abate War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted debuff. Decreases damage done by that siege engine to 98% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Dhar Wind
data.note: Consumes all Dark Magic
data.description:
You expel all of your build-up Dark Magic in a deadly blast, dealing damage to your target based on the amount of Dark Magic that was consumed.
1 - 10 Dark Magic: 75 damage.
11 - 30 Dark Magic: 150 damage.
31 - 70 Dark Magic: 300 damage.
71 - 90 Dark Magic: 600 damage.
91 - 100 Dark Magic: 750 damage.

data.name: Shroud of Darkness
data.description: You draw the shadows close to you, increasing all of your resistances by 378 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Dread Aspect
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Mage Bolt
data.description: A focused blast that deals 600 damage and knocks the targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Dark Blessings
data.description: Direct heals cast on you will recover 10% more health.

data.name: Obsessive Focus
data.description: You become obsessed with your target for 20 seconds, dealing 10% more damage to them, but 90% damage to everyone else.  Even if the target dies, your obsession will persist for the full duration.

data.name: Grip of Fear
data.description: Up to 4 enemies within 30 feet become Rooted, making them unable to move for 5 seconds.    Rooted targets have a 50% chance to break free when they suffer damage.

data.name: Siphon Power
data.description: You drain power from your target, stealing up to 200 action points from your target and giving them to you. Your target's Intelligence will also be reduced by 160 for 30 seconds.

data.name: Devour Energy
data.description: Whenever one of your spells hits an enemy, you have a 25% chance to regain 30 Action Points. This effect cannot occur more than once every 2 seconds.

data.name: Grasping Darkness
data.description: Doombolt and Chillwind will now also cause the victim to lose 20 Action Points, and will reduce their Strength, Intelligence, and Ballistic Skill by 120 for 10 seconds.

data.name: Endless Knowledge
data.description: Increases your Intelligence by 160.

data.name: Misdirection
data.description: You gain a strong counter aura for the next 10 seconds that will reduce half of any incoming Magic damage and redirect half of any direct damage back to the caster.

data.name: Alignment of Naggaroth
data.description: Spiritual resistance increased by 252.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Infernal Gift
data.description: Whenever one of your damaging spells hits an enemy, there is a 25% chance that your other groupmates within 100 feet of you will gain an Infernal Gift, increasing all damage that they deal by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Bathing In Blood
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will regain 471 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Scintillating Energy
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to your target and staggers them for 9 seconds, preventing all actions until they take damage.

data.name: Sleight of Hand
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 50% less than normal.

data.name: Empowered Dhar
data.description: Dhar Wind will now restore your action points, returning an amount equal to the Dark Magic which was expended.

data.name: Dire Blast
data.description: Deals 600 damage to your target immediately, and another 1206 damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Close Quarters
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Reckless Gathering
data.note: Costs 40 Dark Magic
data.description: You instantly regain 160 Action Points.

data.name: Manic Obsession
data.description: Reduces Obsessive Focus's cooldown time by 40 seconds.

data.name: Wind-Woven Shell
data.description: Each groupmember within 100 feet takes only 80% damage for 20 seconds.

data.name: Shatter
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Triumphant Blasting
data.description: Any time you critically hit with a Path Of Destruction ability, the victim will be knocked backwards a moderate distance and mobs will be knocked down.

data.name: Hastened Fear
data.description: Reduces the cooldown times of Dread Aspect and Grip Of Fear by 7 seconds.

data.name: Darkstar Cloak
data.description: None of your abilities will consume action points for 10 seconds.

data.name: Glorious Carnage
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy with a direct damage ability, you will gain 75 points of Morale. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Frozen Fury
data.description: Frozen Touch now has a 75% chance to trigger.

data.name: Unleash the Winds
data.description: Deals 1800 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and knocks them away from you.

data.name: Doombolt
data.note:
Builds 10 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A massive burst of dark power which deals 733 Corporeal damage to your target.

data.name: Gloomburst
data.note:
Builds 25 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A quick-casting spell that deals 403 Spirit damage to your target.

data.name: Frozen Touch
data.description: Everyone in your group that is within 100 feet of you is filled with dark energy for 1 hour, giving them a 25% chance to deal an additional 225 Corporeal damage any time they deal direct damage.

data.name: Arctic Blast
data.note:
Builds 10 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You send a blast of dark energy slamming into your target, dealing 436 Spirit damage.  If the victim is Cursed, then they will also become snared for 5 seconds, reducing their movement speed by 40%.

data.name: Frostbite
data.note:
Builds 10 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You fill your enemy's mind with fear, dealing 291 Corporeal damage and Disarming them for 3 seconds, making them unable to use melee and ranged abilities.

data.name: Recover Energy
data.description:
Any time you damage an enemy with a Path Of Agony ability, you have a 25% chance to regain 50 Action Points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Echo of Power
data.note:
Only usable after an enemy Disrupts one of your spells
Builds 10 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: An instant blast of magic that deals 403 Corporeal damage to your target and can not be defended against.

data.name: Tapping The Dark
data.description: Whenever your Frozen Touch effect triggers for one of your allies, they will become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to 5 seconds which will absorb up to 375 damage.

data.name: Impending Doom
data.note:
Builds 40 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You draw forth a huge amount of Dark Magic and slam your target with a powerful blast of force, dealing 478 Spirit damage.

data.name: Swell of Gloom
data.description: Gloomburst will now deal an additional 403 Spirit damage each time it hits, but will also cause a Backlash every time as well.

data.name: Shades of Death
data.description: Your target is haunted by spectres of death and doom for up to 10 seconds, causing an additional 150 Spirit damage each time that they suffer direct damage.  This effect will occur up to 5 times before fading.

data.name: Soul Stealer
data.description: Your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them suffer 1200 damage and lose 125 Action Points.  You gain 1200 health and 125 Action Points.

data.name: Chillwind
data.note:
Builds 5 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A Curse which deals 615 Corporeal damage to your target over 9 seconds.

data.name: Word of Pain
data.note:
Builds 5 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: Reduces your target's Willpower by 120 for 10 seconds.  When the effect ends, the victim will suffer 514 Spirit damage.

data.name: Ice Spikes
data.note:
Builds 10 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You cause dark energy to burst out of the ground, inflicting a Curse upon all enemies in a line in front of you, up to 65 feet away, which deals 815 Corporeal damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Daemonic Chill
data.description: Everyone in your group that is within 100 feet of you is surrounded by a demonic chill for 1 hour, giving them a 25% chance to deal 187 Corporeal damage back against the attacker when they are struck by a melee attack.

data.name: Vision of Torment
data.note:
Builds 10 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A Curse which causes the enemy to lose 30 Action Points over 5 seconds.  When this effect ends, they will suffer 314 Spirit damage.

data.name: Vision of Domination
data.description: Word of Pain's Willpower debuff is increased to 360 for 5 seconds and will deal 767 Spirit damage at the end of the debuff duration.

data.name: Gloom of Night
data.note:
Builds 20 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A cloud of gloom clings to your target for 15 seconds, dealing 219 Spirit damage every 3 seconds to them and all other enemies within 20 feet of them.

data.name: Shadow of Disaster
data.description: The cost of Chillwind is reduced by 20 and it will reduce the enemy's Spiritual resistance by 378 for 9 seconds.

data.name: Hand of Ruin
data.note:
Builds 15 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: Tendrils of dark energy burst forth from your hand and slice into your target for up to 6 seconds, dealing 492 Spirit damage every 2 seconds.  This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Chilling Gusts
data.description: Each time Chillwind or Ice Spikes damages an enemy, there is a 33% chance that the victim will suffer an additional 216 Corporeal damage as well.

data.name: Absorb Vitality
data.note:
Builds 5 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A Curse which siphons away your enemy's life, dealing 870 Corporeal damage over 15 seconds and healing you for all of the damage dealt.

data.name: Crippling Terror
data.description: Your target and all other enemies within 15 feet of them are Silenced and Disarmed for 7 seconds, making them unable to use melee, ranged, or magic abilities.

data.name: Surging Pain
data.note:
Costs 20 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: Waves of agony roll outwards from you, dealing 231 Corporeal damage to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Shattered Shadows
data.note:
Builds 20 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You crush your foes underneath a blast of living shadow, dealing 516 Spirit damage to your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them.

data.name: Infernal Wave
data.note:
Builds 20 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A cone of dark energy bursts forth in front of you, dealing 315 Spirit damage to enemies up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Pit of Shades
data.note:
Builds 15 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A 20 feet pit of shadow covers the ground at a point that you select for 9 seconds.  Your enemies will suffer 258 Spirit damage every 1.5 seconds while they are within the area.  This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Stricken Voices
data.note:
Builds 20 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: Your enemy becomes overwhelmed with panic, suffering 314 Corporeal damage.  Fear and uncertainty spread rapidly through the enemy ranks, Silencing the target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them for  3 seconds.

data.name: Piercing Shadows
data.description: Any time that your Dark Magic causes an Backlash, the blast will also deal 50% of the damage to all enemies within 30 feet of you.

data.name: Black Horror
data.note:
Builds 10 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You create a maelstrom of evil power which deals 440 Corporeal damage to your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them, and reduces their Initiative by 80 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Lengthening Shadows
data.description: Increases the radius of Surging Pain and the distance of Infernal Wave by 33%.

data.name: Disastrous Cascade
data.note:
Builds 15 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You allow dark powers for flow freely through your body for up to 3 seconds, dealing 255 Spirit damage every second to all enemies within 30 feet.  This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Neverending Agony
data.description: Reduces Infernal Wave's cooldown time by 5 seconds, and Pit Of Shades's cooldown time by 10 seconds.

data.name: Shadow Knives
data.note:
Builds 15 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You create a cloud of dark energy for up to 6 seconds, dealing 332 Corporeal damage to your target and all enemies within 20 feet of them every 2 seconds.  This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Paralyzing Nightmares
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet suffer 1800 damage and become Rooted, making them unable to move for 10 seconds.
